entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 6:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: ESE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing in the evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
